shows.title: Psychic Insights for 2026
shows.guests: Erika Gabriel, James Van Praagh, Mark Nelson, Karyn Reece
shows.first_half: On our New Year's Eve special, four psychics and mediums -- Erika Gabriel, James Van Praagh, Mark Christopher Nelson, and Karyn Reece shared their insights and offered predictions for 2026.

shows.title: AI: Issues & Innovations / Mindset for Success
shows.first_half: First Half: Bart Kosko is a USC Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering and an artificial intelligence researcher. He'll report on how some AI systems may fight back if you try to erase them, AI's growing legal problems and datacenter demands, and the latest on AI servants that search and learn on your behalf.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Licensed psychotherapist and addictions counselor Donna Marks will discuss ways we can improve our lives and establish the mindset needed to succeed. She'll also help us to keep our New Year’s resolutions and explain why some goals are more challenging than others.

shows.title: UFO Investigations / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Alejandro Rojas, a consultant for Enigma Labs —the pioneering data, research, and community platform focused on Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena— joins George Noory to explore the future of UFO investigation. He’ll break down how the Enigma UFO reporting app is transforming public engagement, reveal compelling trends from the latest reports, and examine clusters of sightings, including those near nuclear facilities. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!

shows.title: Non-Verbal Communication / Longevity Tips
shows.first_half: Linda Clemons is one of the top experts in sales and body language. She joins Lisa Garr (email) to discuss the power of nonverbal communication and body language, as well as how to be a human lie detector. Followed by Regan Archibald, one of the nation’s leading longevity experts. He'll offer cutting-edge options for those looking to be free from pain, balance their hormones, increase performance, and optimize their health.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 2/1/02 when Pam Reynolds, who was clinically dead during surgery for an aneurysm, shared her amazing near-death experience.

shows.title: Ethanol Revolution / Dark Entities & Aliens
shows.first_half: First Half: Permaculture teacher and entrepreneur David Blume joins George Noory to discuss how ethanol can be used to fuel your car, make beverages, generate electricity, and make your own herbal medicines. He'll also address what he believes are signs of America running out of oil.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Professional exorcist, clearing expert, and teacher Jeffrey Seelman will share his expertise on the different types of possessions that affect humans. He'll also delve into negative and demonic beings and their intentions toward humanity, as well as how spirits and aliens interact with people.
